pre.expressions.pre.expressions: if (not (null($L.canmove))) then for $L.i = 1 to denull(lng($L.selectrows)) do (if (not (null($L.i in $L.selectrows))) then ($L.line=$L.i in $L.selectrows;$L.do.move=false;$L.new.line=$L.line - 1;option.names in $L.file=denull(option.names in $L.file);option.desc in $L.file=denull(option.desc in $L.file);option.validation.desc in $L.file=denull(option.validation.desc in $L.file);if $L.i in $L.canmove then ($L.do.move=true);if $L.do.move then ($L.remove.name.line=$L.line in option.names in $L.file;$L.remove.desc.line=$L.line in option.desc in $L.file;$L.remove.validation.line=$L.line in option.validation.desc in $L.file);if $L.do.move then (if (not (null($L.remove.name.line))) then (option.names in $L.file=delete(option.names in $L.file, $L.line, 1));if (not (null($L.remove.desc.line))) then (option.desc in $L.file=delete(option.desc in $L.file, $L.line, 1));if (not (null($L.remove.validation.line))) then (option.validation.desc in $L.file=delete(option.validation.desc in $L.file, $L.line, 1)));if $L.do.move then (option.names in $L.file=insert(option.names in $L.file, $L.new.line, 1, $L.remove.name.line);option.desc in $L.file=insert(option.desc in $L.file, $L.new.line, 1, $L.remove.desc.line);option.validation.desc in $L.file=insert(option.validation.desc in $L.file, $L.new.line, 1, $L.remove.validation.line));if $L.do.move then cursor.field.name.set("option.names", $L.new.line);if $L.do.move then ($L.void=jscall("dynamicFormGenerator.rearrangeOptionFields", option.names in $L.file, options in $L.file));$L.void=jscall("dynamicFormGenerator.rearrangeCostFields", option.names in $L.file, option.costs in $L.file)))
